content.name: Needle Ship
content.description: Elongated needle-shaped spacecraft from Spacewar! (1962). Identical mechanics to wedge ship with different visual profile.
content.lore: Player 2's ship in the original Spacewar! The elongated needle design provided visual distinction in the two-player battles.
content.gameplay_notes: Same fuel capacity, torpedo count, and physics as wedge ship. Visual variety only.
